cohortName: [PL 141933001] Alopecia areata referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (141933) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 141933002] Alopecia areata referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (141933) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 141933003] Alopecia (not including specific alopecia that suggest anything other than Alopecia Areata or non scarring alopecia) first diagnosis
logicDescription: Non-scarring Alopecia at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
